attributes.title: this app is HORRIFYING
attributes.review: I opened this app, thinking it was the new hype, I was wrong THEY WERE WRONG. this app has a orange looking hot Cheeto, I could smell the fumes the odor the SPOILED MOLDY CHEETOS all in my home it was disastrous, the smell was HORRID, we had to get pest control from the raccoons showing up, we weren’t able to sleep, my CAT DIED FROM THE SMELL oooh let’s not even talk about the PICTURE. WHAT KIND OF PICTURE IS THAT it showed the hot Cheeto NAKED I didn’t need to see that, that picture was the last thing my poor cat saw he didn’t get to live his 9 lives cus of this app, please don’t download, this app should be REMOVED!

attributes.title: Terrible app!!!! Scarred for life!
attributes.review: The app tracked my location and then trump showed up and abducted 👽 me and my family. He forced me to get a spray tan to look just like him—an orange!!!! he then blew up my home and i was homeless. I started to love in a box but then Trump started to kick my box down a hill where i then broke all my limbs!! i couldn’t go to the hospital bc American healthcare is expensive!!! DO NOT RECCOMEND!!! He then chopped off my limbs 🦵🦵 and ate them!! 👁👄👁 Then he rolled me into a trump flag and ate me like a burrito 🌯 !!! He threw me up though because of the fake tan and then stomped on my remains.

attributes.title: Horrible 😤
attributes.review: This app is so horrifying. The moment I opened the app I was greeted with racial slurs and derogatory terms! How could anyone allow this? I have no idea why it was allowed onto the App Store when it’s refers to false statements such as “make America great again.” There is no way this Oompa Loompa could “make” or even take part in “making” America great again. America wasn’t great to begin with!? The US is built on killing and inslaving Natives. This app is horrible and even sends inappropriate notifications from unknown websites, which is NOT appropriate for an app.

attributes.title: Gave my 15 DiFfReNt types of STDS 😔🧚✨
attributes.review: It was all good and dandy until I opened 😳🖖🏽 n all of a sudden an over greased jumbo Cheeto puff pooped up 🤓👾 i was like eww 😷💕‼️ but the worst part about it was throwing it back 🤬👀 but when I tell u it stank i mean it 🥴👄 it stank like a taco from taco bell sitting on a counter for exactly 3 months and 73 day 🌝🥶 and after all that you’d think this be over but i started to smell something FiShY 🐠😨 i open my leg and I gagged 🤢💩 that jumbo Cheeto puff gave me 15 different stds 🤒 so in conclusion don’t download this app unless ur trynna be the new lovely peaches 🍑🤩🤪😍🥰🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: i only downloaded this app out of respect because i felt bad about what happened at his tulsa rally and this is by far my the WORST app i ever downloaded. i opened the app to see a picture of an orange orangutan on the screen. i tried signing up and my screen kept glitching and freezing. i then went out of the app to try and fix the issue but it showed a picture and him getting a spray tan completely NAKED. i definitely do not recommend this app to anyone after this incredibly inappropriate experience.

attributes.title: I’ll never be the same
attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded this app, i very excitedly opened it to show any support i could against the haters. I was immediately hit in the face with what seems to be Cheeto dust. My eyes started burning ‘one can only assume it was spicy Cheeto dust’. I did my best to wash my eyes, but the after affects feel like I’m constantly getting stringy hairs from a balding man blown into my eyes. I’m having trouble walking up ramps, holding glasses of water and even worse... I’ve become attracted to my daughter. I would NOT recommend this app! Help!

attributes.title: This app made me ugly 👁👄👁
attributes.review: So I wanted to worship the god Shrek you know. But then I see a an UGLY CHEETO!!! EWWW. The toxic thing made me barf and I started shrinking! Then I saw this yummy container with shrek on it so I munched on it. Then I became a block of concrete. I looked at my phone only to have the toxic fumes evaporate me. I was just being air so I go in a store to be air there. But I see a pack of Cheetos that had that weird sweaty Cheeto on it!! I was so disgusted and traumatized that I turned into lava and rolled home to smash my phone and I am texting this in a summoning circle to banish the Cheeto into Antarctica. BOO BAD APP EWW NEGATIVE ZERO STARS ⭐️ YUCK

attributes.title: this app ruined my life
attributes.review: i love trump but this app is terrible. i might have to vote for biden because of this. this app took all of my information and then changed all of my passwords. i can’t enter any account i have, and i can’t even access my bank account. it probably took my money too. i’m on the phone with my bank rn. AND it leaked my address and white supremacists are now trying to fight me. this app ruined my life. please don’t download. i even emailed apple trying to get this app taken down. it is truly dangerous.

attributes.title: 🧚🏻🌺✨🌸Shoot for the moon🥰🌸✨🧚🏻 and never come back.
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw this crusty Cheeto that looked like it had been living under a couch for the past twenty years but it was also wearing corn husks for hair. It was so incredibly disgusting I almost threw up. Oh and bunker baby ran over my pet snail because I didn’t come to his rally, he owes me a new pet snail😡. I was even more disturbed when I saw a shriveled Cheeto that was an inch long I am ✨traumatized✨this app is really not what I’m looking for and I do not recommend to anyone. And ✨🧚🏻🌸💫Trump2020🌟💫🌺🧚🏻 But on a headstone.
